https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/default-vpc.html 

This Default VPC is created so we can create AMIs using Packer in AWS. 

ipcalc 172.31.0.0/16 20
Address:   172.31.0.0           10101100.00011111. 00000000.00000000
Netmask:   255.255.0.0 = 16     11111111.11111111. 00000000.00000000
Wildcard:  0.0.255.255          00000000.00000000. 11111111.11111111
=>
Network:   172.31.0.0/16        10101100.00011111. 00000000.00000000
HostMin:   172.31.0.1           10101100.00011111. 00000000.00000001
HostMax:   172.31.255.254       10101100.00011111. 11111111.11111110
Broadcast: 172.31.255.255       10101100.00011111. 11111111.11111111
Hosts/Net: 65534                 Class B, Private Internet

Subnets after transition from /16 to /20

Netmask:   255.255.240.0 = 20   11111111.11111111.1111 0000.00000000
Wildcard:  0.0.15.255           00000000.00000000.0000 1111.11111111

 16.
Network:   172.31.240.0/20      10101100.00011111.1111 0000.00000000
HostMin:   172.31.240.1         10101100.00011111.1111 0000.00000001
HostMax:   172.31.255.254       10101100.00011111.1111 1111.11111110
Broadcast: 172.31.255.255       10101100.00011111.1111 1111.11111111
Hosts/Net: 4094                  Class B, Private Internet


Subnets:   16
Hosts:     65504


Note: 
This network will not be used to host our app.
Only one subnet is required by Packer.
Also a SSH Pub Key gets uploaded to AWS.


Run:
- terraform init
- terraform plan
- terraform apply -auto-approve
- packer validate jenkins-ami.json
- packer build jenkins-ami.json
- terraform destroy -auto-approve
